ags:resource.dc:title: Hake recruitment in the southern stock (ICES divisions Vlllc and IXa).
ags:resource.dc:publisher: International Council for the Exploration of the Sea (ICES)
ags:resource.dc:description: Spatial distribution and year class strength for hake in the Southern stock (ICES Oivisions Vlllc and IXa) are analysed from historical series from spanish bottom trawl surveys (1980-1990). A nursery ground in the continental shelf of the northern coast of the Iberian peninsula is compared with the recruitment in adjacent areas (Portuguese and French waters).
ags:resource.dc:identifier: Pereiro, F. J. ; Sánchez, F. ; Fontenla, J. 1991 Hake recruitment in the southern stock (ICES divisions Vlllc and IXa). ICES CM Doc. 1991/G:52 20p.
